data.oai_dc:dc: Downscaled and debiased paleoclimatic simulations from CCSM3 (Liu et al. 2009). Downscaled to 0.5deg lat/lon and 500-year resolution for North America for 21,000 years ago to the 20th century. These TIFS were generated from the decadal-scale NetCDF data, and extracted as climatic summaries comprising 200-year bins and spaced 500 years apart. They are formatted for direct input into species distribution models.
